title: How Ekko's Ultimate Will Work
body:
If you haven't already seen the champion teaser for Ekko then check it out here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtEpp9lkfxA

I have a theory for those who have watched the teaser. Every time Ekko goes back in time he ends up in the same position. His hand pulling on an ignition chain for his time machine. This probably means that in-game you can set a "recall point" just before a team fight, if the team fight goes bad, you take your whole team back to the recall point. This would allow counter-play, rather than just going back 7 seconds (imagine, you'd never be ganked). 

Also look at how his injuries seem to stay even when he goes back in time. When the Singed/Urgot thing crushes his arm it stays limp for the rest of the fight. Probably in-game he'll reset everyone's cooldowns and health but not his own (or else you would just spam ult right?).

TL;DR
His ult is going to go back to a certain point, not go back by a set time. It will also manipulate time around Ekko, but not his own time (no cooldown resets for Ekko himself etc.)
